website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice if you need a brow gel that stays put once dried, and prefer darker shades. However, it may disappoint you if you prefer a soft blonde color.
pros: A long-wearing formula that lives up to its name, and has impressive staying power that lasts as long as two days
Does a great job filling in sparse areas and gives brows a full, defined look
cons: Applicator brush has soft bristles and is messy – blotting it helps, but wastes product
Blonde shade is too dark for many blondes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!! 🤗I normally wear Anastasia Beverly Hills brow wiz (Med to dark brown) which I love but wanted to try this product ever since I saw a tutorial/review on it. I am super picky when it comes to my brows and ABH is the only eyebrow product that has ever really impressed me until now. I was looking for something that would have a little more of a permanent effect and this did not disappoint! It really does stay on ALL day with no smudging! This is definitely by far the best drug store eyebrow product!❤️ (Purchased in the color soft brown)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I’ve tried Wunderbrow, and hated it. Orignally I bought the light brown but it was too dark for me. I then bought the blonde and it works great. My hair is auburn red and I have pale skin, the blonde made my eyebrows a good color. If you mess up, just use some micellaire solution on a q-tip. It doesn’t last 2 days, but it lasts all day with sweating and performing wudu (washing before prayer).
customer_reviews.author: AMA

customer_reviews.title: It works! If it stays on in Florida humidity, it'll stay on anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This stuff stayed on for 2 days through my gym workout and cutting the grass....in FLORIDA! Our heat index has been 100°-105° all week. I was careful not to wipe my eyebrows of course when I would wipe the sweat off my face. The 2nd time I used it I put a little too much which just made my eyebrows darker and stiff. No one could tell and the stiffness went away a few minutes later, no biggie. I still do use my other eyebrow powder to shape my eyebrows but at least with the tattoo gel I have filled in brows the entire day. I love this stuff and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Maacje

customer_reviews.title: Really stays in place all day and night
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! I have it on subscribe and save because I cannot run out. I’m an outdoors Alaskan girl who camps, hunts and fishes without ever having to worry that I’ve wiped half a brow off. This truly is an all day and night brow gel. It takes some time to figure out the applicator and how to use it just right to shape your brow how you like it. I definitely suggest this to all my friends because it works! And the cost?! Hello! It’s a win win.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special? Literally the worst brush known to man kind, just cakes on thick paste and doesn’t stay long.
customer_reviews.author: Retail therapy

customer_reviews.title: Not for blonde brows....
customer_reviews.text: Either they sent me the wrong color, or they have no clue what shade blonde eyebrows are supposed to be. It was a complete waste of my money. The reason I gave it 3 stars is because, if I had dark hair, this would have been great! But that's not the case, I'm a natural blonde, with blonde eyebrows, and pale skin...
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Just nope.
customer_reviews.text: Where to begin. I ordered the blonde because I'm fair haired. I followed the instructions to the T and still ended up with two wooley caterpillars on my face. The color was so dark that my husband said I looked like Charlie Chaplin without the mustache. Honestly, my four year old could've done a better job with finger paints.
customer_reviews.author: J&K2013

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Makeup consistency of mud. Thick and sticky paint-like. Goops on eyebrow hair. Applicator is too large for precise application. It just globs on and then somehow you’re supposed to wipe off excess and shape with a q-tip, maybe? Very difficult to shape your eyebrows that way. I used the brush but it just brushed it off. I left it on for an hour to see if it worked better dry. It just wiped off. So sad 😔
customer_reviews.author: Tony McGrath

customer_reviews.title: You CAN Teach an Old Dog New Tricks!
customer_reviews.text: I've never reviewed a make up type or brand before but feel compelled to comment on this product. The wand is simple to use..my advice: Go lightly until you get the hang of it.. follow with a swipe of the enclosed brow brush.. natural looking brows instantly! The color looks natural for my (60+) age.. not too young and not blantantly "drawn on". I've used pencils for years. This is my first experience with a wand...I'm sold! Cleans up easily and as an extra special bonus..oftentimes it will last a day or so with little to no touch up. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: adrianne hurtig

customer_reviews.title: Great Brow & eye liner with staying power!
customer_reviews.text: I am a makeup person and since it's all about the eyes & brows right now! I was anxious to try even through their were mixed reviews. I'm in big likes with this product. It has great staying power, not sticky if you don't over apply. Start out with a light application and build if you want heavier or thicker brows. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie N

customer_reviews.title: Stays On All Day!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! My eyebrows are sparse and since I can't afford to get eyebrows tattooed, this is the next best thing. My eyebrows stay on all day and even into the next morning (if I don't wash them off at night) with the exception of where my eyeglass frames touch them but it's really not noticeable. I would give this item 5 stars if it were easier to apply because the sponge applicator doesn't allow for precision so I use an angled eyeliner brush. It takes a little practice but getting better every day. Very please with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Organically Well

customer_reviews.title: Kicks Anastasia’s butt!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best product I have ever used on my brows. I have white eyebrows and through my life have been going through different products which started with eyebrow pencils, dying and then I ended up using Anastasia for many years. This product not only is a third of the price of Anastasia it also stays on for days even sleeping on my side has not worn off the product . Also the colors are much better than what Anastasia offers. I selected the soft brown because I like my eyebrows to be darker than my hair color ( which it should be) and the look is really great .
customer_reviews.author: Christine Thibeault

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice product, just too dark for me
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice product, just too dark for me. My daughter said, "Oh no mommy" when she saw me. I was just experimenting with it. You'll have to use it very lightly or you'll look like a nut lol!
customer_reviews.author: MsDee

customer_reviews.title: Natural look!!! A “mascara “ for your brows.
customer_reviews.text: If you have bald spots, grey or blond eyebrows you will love this. I brush it on against the way the hair lays. Then I let it dry. Finally, I comb it into place. It stays all day and looks natural. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Color lasts - applicator needs work
customer_reviews.text: I have been using brow powder for years, and even with setting wax it’s often sweated/wiped off by the end of the day. So I was excited to hear about this product. The good news- this stuff does stay put but once again a brow coloring product arrives with basically a mascara type swizzler to apply. Someday I hope someone notices brows and eyelashes are made of very different hair. I end up using a cotton swab to clean up after applying otherwise I’d go out looking like a werewolf. Also - even the lightest shade is still too dark on me, (fair skinned, dark blond hair) but I’m used to that by now.
customer_reviews.author: Redhart

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for a year now!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the wonderbrow before switching and im a faithful customer. These work just as well but for 1/2 the price of the wonderbrow. The only thing is I can’t use the brush it comes with it. Instead I use my own flat brush and swipe into my brows. I use the blonde color is nice and it lasts all day. I’ve even woken up with my eyebrows next day. I have to use makeup remover to completely remove it when I want a clear face. Been using it for a year now will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gris

customer_reviews.title: works as well as WonderBrow for less
customer_reviews.text: I've used WonderBrow for the past several months, but the color I needed wasn't available. I tried this one as a replacement, and found it works just as well. The color is just as I needed, the gel isn't stiff when it dries, and so far has lasted a full day fine. It does wash off easily with soap/water, so I'm not sure the relevance of "lasting up to 2 days" unless you don't wash your face. Its a smaller tube than the WonderBrow, so I'll have to compare how long it lasts when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephaniek219

customer_reviews.title: It’s a winner and I won’t ever switch. This gel  is waterproof and smudge proof too !!! Yay!
customer_reviews.text: This eyebrow gel is the best eyebrow product I have ever used a I have tried many other methods and spent many, many dollars looking for the “right” product . You don’t need to use hardly any because a little goes a long way. I do have a problem with the last eye gel I ordered but the tube I received was not the color I ordered. It is labeled 250 Blonder- Blonde but it was a much darker color . I still have my last tube which is the 259 Blonder- Blonde and compared both of the tubes and the new on I’d much darker. Please advice as to how we can rectify the situation. Thank you MRV
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer, MVR

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but, it's REALLY DARK
customer_reviews.text: I have very dark brown hair and very dark eyebrows, so I originally got this soft brown, but it was TOO DARK so I gave it to my friend who has black eyebrows. I then got the blonde color and it was almost JUST AS DARK! Ha. But, I used it sparingly and I LOVE IT. It stays on for a few days and while it will come off with makeup remover, it is long lasting compared to other eyebrow stuff i use. Highly recommend it, but if you have light to blonde eyebrows, this won't work for you, even the blonde color.
customer_reviews.author: Katie ATop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not blonde
customer_reviews.text: An okay product but I sent it back because it is just not light enough. Still on my search for an actual blonde eyebrow gel for someone with actual blonde eyebrows. OK update - can't send it back; so I guess I'll see if there is anything I can use it for ...
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Grier

customer_reviews.title: Best Brow Product Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Maybelline Tattoo Studio Waterproof Eyebrow Gel is exactly what I need! I love this stuff. The color is great. I use my regular eyebrow brush and spoolie to apply. I remove the applicator from the tube and put some on my brush. Then I apply to my eyebrows. So easy to apply. Really very long lasting. No smudging. It only takes a very small amount. I'm so incredibly satisfied with this product. So much more than I was expecting. I will be buying more. Please make this forever! Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Kitseyboo

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all day
customer_reviews.text: This stuff stays on your brows - you have to use makeup remover and elbow grease to get it off. This is nice (no worried about eyebrow gel driping down your face when it rains or if you sweat), but an issue if you apply too much (which is easy to do) or mess up. The brush is WAY too big. I've been using the one from my glossier boy brow, which is a better size/shape. I got the blonde color and it is too dark - but has no red undertones, which I like. I also got the soft brown, but haven't even opened it since the blonde is so dark.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Veldhuis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this eyebrow makeup - but hate the brush that comes with it simply because I have sparse brows and it globs on too thickly. It would work for those with more brows. I actually use an eyebrow brush to draw the lines that look like hairs - it looks amazing and lasts quite a long time. I'd purchase it again. I wish I'd started using it sooner because dealing with pesky brow powder was slavery compared to the easy of this product!
customer_reviews.author: LBDDiaries

customer_reviews.title: Careful when choosing color
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when choosing color ...I got soft brown it's more like a dark taupe....I do like the product it everything that the description saids.....the color is really way off....even the color chart looks like a soft brown...oh well I hate to return something that is so inexpensive and I wont....I am going to work with it and try to put on less
customer_reviews.author: queenky

customer_reviews.title: color
customer_reviews.text: Warm brown color was a weird color. Item not returnable and I don't know anyone who could use this odd color.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie M

customer_reviews.title: Better Choice
customer_reviews.text: Last time I bought eyebrow liner I bought Wunderbrow. Although it is the best seller, I was not completely satisfied with the application. I am very happy I tried this product. The application brush has little bristles, so it went on much better, easier. It looks very good in the color I chose, which was the same as Wunderbrow. I’m happier this comes in a tube because I can squeeze it down to the very last drop. It lasts better on my eyebrows through a few days of washing my face. Very good product, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: MissT

customer_reviews.title: Dry empty tube
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product and a total eyebrow transformation product, however when I received it in the mail, the product looks completely dried out. Barely anything comes out of the tube, and I’m wondering if they sent me an old dried out batch. I’ve purchased the same product from Wal-Mart and it’s always on point. Maybe amazon was storing an old batch and I was the unfortunate one who’s money got wasted :(
customer_reviews.author: Sobia H.

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of this eyebrow gel
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this eyebrow gel, but found the color to be way too dark for my skin tone. I'm a dirty blonde and while I like to have darker eyebrows, this went on way too dark. The application is easy enough and it is long-lasting, I just wish they offered it in a lighter shade.
customer_reviews.author: rubear11

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months, but darker. Glad they had the light blonde in stock. I had my brows permanent make-up, but the girl that did them moved before I could get my touch up. So I'm using this and I swear by it. Stays on for days. Even in the hot humid heat in FL., the pool, the shower, even sleeping with an eye mask on. And the tube last long. I got the lighter color today and love it. So I ordered more asap. 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the applicator
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I like the formula. It has a smooth consistency and once it dries there’s minimal smudging. However, the applicator sucks! I tried to use it 3 times but it didn’t work for me. I kept putting too much product on my eyebrow even when I wiped the excess gel off of the brush. The brush itself was basically too thick. I eventually just applied the brow gel with a small angled brush which gave me the precision that I like. I would buy this product again, but I would NEVER use the applicator that it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: City

customer_reviews.title: Good color but not long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good color gel. I am glad I got this color and did not go darker. I have dark brown hair and olive skin Asian girl. It is hard to apply and does require practice and skill. It is however not as lasting as advertised. I can wipe it off removing my make up or if I sweat and wipe my forehead it will come off. So to advertise it is tattoo is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Heavy

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day and night but not after sleeping on it
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it stays put. I'm still getting used to the wand. I tried using an small angle brush like I saw some do on YouTube videos but that's kind of a hassle, really. I am getting much better at angling the wand in such a way that it leaves a sharp line. Also, doing a bit of a final touch up with a moist q-tip before it dries helps give me a sharper line. All in all, compared to anything else I've bought, I like this one best, so far.
customer_reviews.author: XENA22

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Given that all makeup is way overpriced, this is one of the better bargains. The soft tube contains more product than the usual hard type, and the applicator holds more mascara at a time because it's a sponge, so I dab it on the brush first. The color is good for medium blond. This Maybelline Eyebrow Gel is the best result of years of trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryAuthor

customer_reviews.title: does the last. went to sleep nd woke up ...
customer_reviews.text: does the last. went to sleep nd woke up ... brows were gone. water resistant not water proof. kind of disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my go to brow product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a child of the 90's so my eyebrows have been plucked to Oblivion. I love this product, it's waterproof and super long wearing... I know once my brows are on I don't need to worry about them the rest of the day. I definitely don't recommend using the applicator brush it comes with. I use a small eyeliner brush to pick up product off the cap brush and apply it to my brows. It helps you to be more precise and only apply as much as you need without going overboard looking like groucho marks.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: The stuff last for days! After a few days of reapplying it can start to look clumpy and I have to start over again. But it will not come off in the water unless I scrub it. When I wash my face I make sure to go around my eyebrows. I get compliments daily on my eyebrows! The application is a little bit tricky but I ordered a lipstick brush and that makes applying extremely easy. I just use the lipstick brush on the dab stick that comes with the tattoo. I have realized it really is an art when it comes to applying eyebrows when you don’t have any!
customer_reviews.author: Cloudsurfing

customer_reviews.title: Not well designed and not for Everybody- AVOID
customer_reviews.text: This is product is a FAIL. The color is horrible, the application brush is horrible-ER, and it's messy and creates angry eyebrows! It's a time eater and waste of money- go back and start completely over Maybelline- can't believe this made it to market . I can do more with crayons...
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff last a long time! I used a small eyeliner brush to apply a more hair-like stroke since my brows are thinner. Works great! If I don’t wipe it off, it will just need a touch up the next day. The color is a bit darker than shown, so I would honestly go a level down than what you think you might need. I had to purchase a lighter shade in store after receiving this because they had a lot more color options.
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Applicator doesn't allow for precise / smooth application
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased with this product. The applicator is so thick and the product globs on it, so there is no way to apply to your brows in a precise or smooth delicate application which is what you need for your brows to look natural. if you want a fake, painted, thick brow look, this is your product.
customer_reviews.author: jvanarck

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: The coverage is perfect, especially if you have white hairs. Eyebrows do dry stiff. I apply moisturizer using a q tip. That softens the hairs and the color does not come off. I like this a lot!
customer_reviews.author: itsmenyc

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again
customer_reviews.text: There were so many things not right about this product. The color was too dark to look natural on a blonde. But the most disappointing parts are that the applicator is too thick to apply it accurately, and the consistency is very sticky. Plus, it smells like wood varnish. While the odor doesn't linger as it dries, it's awful to smell while applying. I'll stick with pencil liners.
customer_reviews.author: E. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: From No Brows to Yes Brows
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of eyebrow hair but it's super light and scarce. I do my eyebrows every day, and I've been looking for something like eyebrow tint or dye. This was something that I wanted to try and I'm actually happy with the results. I'm not sure how to make it smoother, but it looks pretty good. :) here are some embarrassing before and afters. The third one is a bonus of my first attempt which was not too successful.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Martinez

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!! BAD ALLERGIC REACTION!!
customer_reviews.text: This gave me such a bad allergic reaction!!!! I ended up at the Urgent Care!! I included images of how it looked right after I had it done. I was happy with the result right after 10 minutes when my eyes and my entire forehead got very swollen. I had trouble removing the product, which I guess is the whole point of it, so in that it's very good. I have no idea what's in the composition but I'm never allergic to any cosmetics so it's not like I'm sensitive. This should be remove from shelves
customer_reviews.author: Ariadna I Montes de Oca

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: A little dark for my taste but it does work. My hair Color is a goldish tone with champagne highlights so it was a little dark. I’ve been Dabbing not too much and then adding my normal color and it’s working. Giving it three stars just for the color not being accurate but works
customer_reviews.author: Naya

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It does stay on better than the pencil eyeliners however, it is definitely not waterproof because I can take off the errors with a dab of water and a cotton swab. This isn’t bad though...it stays on and you can make corrections. For this product, a little goes a long way so don’t put too much on your brow. Just put 1/4 of a raindrop and work it into your brows. I usually put the drop in the center of my brow and work it left and right (to the front and end) of brow.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I personally like this better than NYX
customer_reviews.text: I personally like this better than NYX. I find it easier to use. I use an angle brush to outline them then use the brush inside the tube to fill them out. I then use the angle brush to spread it around evenly then brush with a spooly. The only issue is that I have very oily skin so even though they are waterproof, it does smudge when I sleep. But I didn't expect it to be able to last more than a day
customer_reviews.author: Dana Van

customer_reviews.title: Globs come out.
customer_reviews.text: The wand inside the product is so fat that it pulls globs of product out. This is supposed to be for eyebrows and as such it is a defective design. There is no way to put that product back in there. Very wasteful. If I wanted to use this at all, I'd need to wipe almost all of the product off the wand. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothee Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome!!! Works absolutely perfectly for my eyebrows! And I got the two pack for under 10 dollars which was an amazing deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: I bought the darker brown. I normally use Benefit KaBrow Cream Gel in 4.5. This brown is at least a full shade lighter than that even though the pics make it look like it's the same. I recommend using your own angled brow brush to apply. If you have to go over the same area a couple times, it gets a little sticky and it can be tough to get a clean line. It also washes right off with my nightly face soap. It lasts ok through the day but I found the top edge got splotchy after 10 ish hours. For the price, I guess it is ok but I'll stick to my KaBrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go for it.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. The product lasts forever and actually stays on all day. I used to use wunderbrow but wanted something more economical, and I’m really happy with this. I have light brown hair that turns blonde in the summer, and the light brown shade is perfect. I apply with an angled brush instead of the applicator in the cap; gives me a little more control and lets me line my brows the way I like them. Never clumpy, and I’m VERY active and I’ve never had it run or smudge. Definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: really stays on
customer_reviews.text: Medium brown was a little too light in color for me. But, my hair is dark brown, I should have ordered a dark brown. The gel has a spoolie, but no angle application brush.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Stays on for days!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and cheapest long lasting formula I've found. I did my eyebrows yesterday and even took a shower (I didn't try to wash off my brows) and its then next day now, and they're still on! Keep in mind, I shaved off the beginning part of my brows because I like to draw in little hair strokes, and my brows still look great. I took off one star for the applicator wand that comes with it, I don't use it, or like it. I use an eyeliner brush or eyebrow brush from Anastasia Beverly Hills instead for a more realistic looking brow (you can create hair strokes this way).
customer_reviews.author: Goldie2k18

customer_reviews.title: Stays on while swimming!
customer_reviews.text: Finding this product was heaven-sent. I don’t have any eyebrows and I used pencil for years. Maybelline Tattoo Brow Gel doesn’t rub off during the day, last overnight, but does come off a bit on the case. I can live with that because I can swim or perspire and they don’t rub off. Just pat when drying. Terrific product!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Bakowski

customer_reviews.title: Favorite makeup product I have ever purchased!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about two years. I have a thick eyebrow shape but the hair is not dark so I use this WITH AN ANGLED BRUSH, to fill in my brows. Compared to every pomade or powder I used in the past this never budged (unless you sweat a ton and wipe your face) but even in water being on the beach it will barely come off! And depending on your skills to fill in your brows, it looks very natural. I wouldn’t recommend using the brush it already has on the applicator. I used Anastasia brush #12
customer_reviews.author: Somara

customer_reviews.title: at best a so so product
customer_reviews.text: for blonde it was very dark and clumpy to apply
customer_reviews.author: Ms Lewie3-Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Last forever and smudge-proof
customer_reviews.text: My fav brow product that I’ve been faithful to for 2 years now. I get many compliments on how they love how my brows look naturally filled. The best part about it is it’s smudge-proof. It’s hard to take off! Which I love because with previous brow products, they would gradually slide or wear off due to natural oil or sweat. Not this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: jtina206

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: soft brown is not a light color. The messy color is more chocolate brown.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: A little thick
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying a lot of these to find one that adds just the right amount of coverage and doesn't make me look like I made up my brows (I am 64 years old and just want to fill in the gaps). This was just okay. The best so far was from overseas but after doing a lot of research I found it was not a cruelty free company so I need something else.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better applicator
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color and the wear on this but I had to use a brush applicator because the one that it comes with is way too big. I used an angled flat eyeliner brush so I could get hair like strokes. The formula definitely lasts and doesn't budge.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crow

customer_reviews.title: Mascara for your eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for anyone with sparse or graying brows. Mine are a little of both and I had been filling them in with a brow pencil for years. I took a new position recently and I work harder and sweat more and my brows were wiped away early in the day. This is smudge-proof and doesn't wipe away easily if at all. But go easy when applying, less looks more natural and it can be a little clumpy like mascara.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ruppert

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Product get thick and unmanageable very quickly on hair, and looks streaky on skin. Does not last as well on skin as on hair. Perhaps this wasn’t the real stuff? The applicator is useless as well.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Great staying power!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that I could wear in the pool that wouldn’t smudge or wipe off easily. This brow makeup is fantastic! It does stay a little tacky if you apply too thick but t it stays on for days. It’s easy to remove with makeup remover wipes too or just plain coconut oil. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I like the way it goes on and the way it stays on. But my problem was the color I chose the very lightest shade and it was still too dark. I was very disappointed that I could not use it if it was in a lighter shade. Then the lightest one they have. I would love this.
customer_reviews.author: gail gable

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This eyebrow color is great! It goes on Relatively easy, but the applicator isn’t super precise so I usually have to touch up the edges with a q-tip. I originally tried the regular blonde color, but I was kind of orange-y, so this color looked much better!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow product ever!
customer_reviews.text: I lost half of my eyebrow to a dog bite...yes, ew! I tried at least a half dozen products before finding this one. I LOVE this tattoo studio gel! It stays on all day until bedtime. It comes with a spool brush to make it look like actual eyebrows on my bare skin. I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: HollyAnne

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, needs a different applicator
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I actually never use the applicator because it just smudges the product everywhere. I use a brow brush to apply the product to my brows, allowing me to get in between hairs and to create hair-like lines. Other than that, I love love love it. It lasts all day, sweat/water proof, and looks very natural.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: which is why I like this product
customer_reviews.text: Since I have blonde hair, it's hard to find products for my eyebrows that isn't too dark, which is why I like this product. However, it's not exactly great on the waterproof aspect. I was assuming it would be hard to come off and would last a couple days, but it comes right off with my Aveeno face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful brows for days
customer_reviews.text: The bad: I only got 1 tube. The good: I can't live without this and the stores around me don't have it. The color is perfect and it stays on. Like it sticks on and doesn't budge. So don't make your brows too large. Just swipe it on and you can go a week without washing your brows. Yes, I have done that.
customer_reviews.author: Luckeegurl

customer_reviews.title: I will never purchase another brow product
customer_reviews.text: This product works best when using a clean angled brush and dipping into the product on the doe foot and then apply. It does dry on the brush fairly quickly so you do have to work a little fast but it’s definitely not problematic. It lasts all day! It can look natural or painted on, it just depends on how heavy handed you are and what look you’re going for. But I seriously swear by this and the tube lasts forever
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Love

customer_reviews.title: Eyebrows, all day every day!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Finally my eyebrows stay in place all day no matter the weather, my workout or the occasional nap! I'm blond, and if you are too you know the struggle of the disappearing eyebrows. Apply then once and they stay on until you shower and actually scrub them off. My only fear now is that this product won't be around forever so I'm ordering them by the dozen!
customer_reviews.author: June McEntire

customer_reviews.title: Decent eyebrow gel
customer_reviews.text: I think it would make more sense as a product if the spoolie was the main wond attached to the lid. Drys pretty fast so clean up with a makeup wipe or concealer is a must of you're about that "eyebrows on fleek" life. If you're going for a bushy look, no wipenor concealer is needed. Takes some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Aalieya Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very little product.
customer_reviews.text: THis product has very little in it and it does smudge. It doesn't last more than 24 hours. Ran out in less that 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Apply lightly!
customer_reviews.text: You MUST wipe off brush on applicator tube or you’ll apply too much! Use a light touch, you can always add more if needed. Stays on about 3 days ,might need a little touch up. But I take it off with makeup remover when I wash my hair and start fresh. Nice not to have to use eyebrow pencil everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for long time,this purchasing is the cheapest!I really love this product,But it's not really waterproof like the description.it's long lasting,still better than others!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all day!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I wash my face each night and the color is still on - even through sweating during workouts and the Texas heat. (Have not tried going more than one day but it would likely last.). I had trouble using the mascara-type wand so I dip my slanted eyebrow brush into the bristles to get gel then apply as I normally would. Going against the hair growth helps for getting the gel onto the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shay0124

customer_reviews.title: Ok brows
customer_reviews.text: This product is just ok. It doesn’t really stay on as well as it says. If I sweat at the gym, it tends to come off a bit. I’m a light skinned African American with dark brown hair but the deep brown is a bit dark for me. Maybe a lighter shade will work better. I do like the fact that I’m able to clean up mistakes easily with a q-tip but wish it would stay on better.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lady

customer_reviews.title: nasty
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just don't know how to use this correctly but I think I would get a better result from a sharpie! Not a fan. Globs on and is very thick and dark (I bought the blonde). Those that are able to use it successfully, more power to you. My friend and I were not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Staying power eyebrow gel
customer_reviews.text: For years I’ve been spending on higher end brands of eyebrow pomades that never lasted or totally gave me the look I desired. . I rolled the dice on Maybelline and the color works well with my colored hair, and it lasts until I take it off. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chatterbox

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: Med Brown is more like dark brown. I've re-ordered in a lighter tone but not received yet. You get two brushes, the one attached to the tube cap and another without a cap. It would be nice if both brushes had a cap so you could leave the one you most want to use as the tube cap. I still use an eyebrow pencil but use the brush to cover stray white hairs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Springer

customer_reviews.title: Formula needs work
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this as I though this could be used at night and in the morning, after a shower or two, my brows would still be filled in and I could proceed to my day. Doesn’t work, doesn’t stay. Now you can apply this in the morning and it will last all day, not a smudge or flake. But by the next morning your brows are gone. That’s fine but my brow pomades do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Ross

customer_reviews.title: COLOR TO DARK FOR NATURAL BLONDE EYEBROWS
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blonde tattoo eyebrow make up because I am a natural blonde and my brows are very, very light. I normally use a plain "blonde" pencil but thought I would like to try the gel. When I applied it, it was very dark brown in color. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BarbND

customer_reviews.title: TRICKS OF THE BROW
customer_reviews.text: Forget the HIGH end big dollar products ladies! Save it for the hair salon! I kept shelling out money - BROWS are a pain in the butt! I started buying WET N WILD (Color Icon Brow Pencil - Brunettes Do It Better) and this - I pencil in with WetnWild, then finish off with this - ALL DAY HOLD!
customer_reviews.author: CPerkins

customer_reviews.title: This product works! Be sure to get the right color!
customer_reviews.text: I never shaved my eyebrows, thank goodness! And I felt this could be the answer to my thinning eyebrows. Unfortunately, i believe I got the wrong color. I should have gotten blond. I did try the product, and it does work!!! I just felt like groucho Marc for a couple days! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow filler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. People always compliment my eyebrows. My eyebrows are thin, and sparse from years of over plucking and this is by far the best filler I have used. It truly is waterproof and looks so natural once applied. I will never use anything else and they better never discontinue this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Kongo

customer_reviews.title: Very Light Brown
customer_reviews.text: This soft brown is very light compared to other soft browns make by Maybelline. I have not tried it . The color really put me off. Maybe when you apply it maybe it gets darker I do not know yet. I will try and update my opinion later.
customer_reviews.author: mms.crazy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a repurchase and I absolutely love it. It’s more affordable than other eyebrow products I’ve used in the past and it’s long-lasting even in the Florida heat and even with my oily skin. I love a bold brow and this gives me that look. I apply with a dense, thin eyeshadow brush for more precision and I’m really happy with the look I get from it and always get compliments on my brows.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Stays on for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I draw in my eyebrows with this before bed and I wake up to natural looking, long lasting, filled in eyebrows. It is great to use on skin with no hair, but it will be removed more easily with cleanser without hair to hold onto it.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for those with skimpy eyebrows!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product- It's easy to use but takes a bit of practice. You DON'T need alot on the wand and need to scrape the access off before applying and if you use the brush to smooth it out it blends well with your natural eyebrows. It's truly been a lifesaver for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: This is it 🥰
customer_reviews.text: I've used many products and several expensive ones and this by far is the best. I even did microblading but that didn't fill in sparse brows enough. I use a lip liner brush to go over my brows and give them that full look instead of the wand they give. I like the wand but the brush gives me more control and less product. I run and work out and really sweat and my brows stay but pretty well. I can wipe them off some if I try but overall they stay put. This will be my forever product.
customer_reviews.author: laurajojetter

customer_reviews.title: Best brow product out there!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWESOME! I have so many brow products that don't stay on and this stuff does. It's a bit goopy, I would like to see a better applicator-thats why I took off a star. But overall the staying power is phenomenal
customer_reviews.author: Coconutty

customer_reviews.title: From towhead to platinum white
customer_reviews.text: I was a towhead as a child (white blonde) and ended as a white haired adult. Of course my eye brows have always been light too. I have used light brown eyebrow color which wasn’t really satisfactory. This light blonde eyebrow color is great, adding enough color to give definition. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Floss

customer_reviews.title: but it was and did an excellent job of coloring a few greys scattered that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think darkest brown color would be dark enough, but it was and did an excellent job of coloring a few greys scattered that I don't want to pluck or thread, applied and removed daily.
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It’s easy to use. I use a brow brush to apply. Lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Madrigal

customer_reviews.title: It's a great eyebrow color and easy to apply. Lasts thru sweat and just..GET IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this eyebrow gel. It fills brows great and then the spoolie blends the gel/tint very evenly. It wipes off when applying if you need to fix it. I just used a tissue with water to clean around rough edges. I got the dark brown color. Great shade of brown. Reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: carlee

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!! Long lasting wear. I love this the color is perfect and it’s water proof. I just wish it worked better on oily skin bc after the first day I have to reapply to the beginning part of my brow where my t-zone is bc i get so oily!
customer_reviews.author: Asaia Davis

customer_reviews.title: My eyebrows do look like the pic on the box after application
customer_reviews.text: It is waterproof but lasts about a day, not the commercialised 2. My color is between the med brown and dark brown, hope theh made a med-dark brown color. Applicator could be a little pointier for the ends if my brows. Decent product. My eyebrows do look like the pic on the box after application. I have microbladed permanent eyebrows but I need a touch up. This product gives a fresh look and will tie me over until I get a touchup.
customer_reviews.author: sweetpotatochips

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of My Anastasia Beverly Hills brow dip smudging so I went to look for something else that wasn't too expensive unseen Alexis Jade has review on it and instantly bought it the color is perfect for women with dark hair I don't use the applicator to apply it I use a brush and pick up the product off the applicator. so far I like it I will not be purchasing anastasiias brow dip again . This will be my new go to eyebrow product
customer_reviews.author: Ana Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Lasts through workouts and runs
customer_reviews.text: For me this lasts for a few days. I’m careful when I’m removing my makeup and washing my face not to rub on my eyebrow area. I am an avid runner and it lasts through sweaty exercises! For the price it can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Whatever It’s my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great eyebrow product for summer!
customer_reviews.text: I love the formula and the staying power or this eyebrow gel, but the applicator seems more like a liquid eyeshadow applicator than an eyebrow applicator. I’ve found it to work best when applied with an angled eyebrow brush instead of the applicator it comes with. The little eyebrow spoolie it comes with is a good touch though .
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: You can make it dark or make it light. I use a tapered brow brush and dab it on the applicator then to my brow. It stays on all day, will not smear like a pencil. For me it wont pass the sleep test. However, this stays on all day and for me a whole day is everything! I really really like this brow product.
customer_reviews.author: JANET B.

product_meta.title: Maybelline TattooStudio Waterproof Eyebrow Gel Makeup, Soft Brown, 0.23 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description: Color:255 SOFT BROWN| Size:0.23 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Achieve eyebrow impact that lasts for days with Maybelline New York’s Tattoostudio™ Waterproof Eyebrow Gel. Fill and color your eyebrows with this ultra-resistant, long-lasting and waterproof brow gel. The gel features a sculpting tip applicator and separate eyebrow spoolie that work together to create fuller, natural-looking brows that are smudge-proof and last for days. Does not transfer. Available in 4 natural eyebrow color shades. 98% saw fuller and thicker eyebrows, 93% saw gel does not transfer, and 88% would recommend to a friend. Packaging may vary, what you receive may not be what is reflected on site.
feature_bullets: TATTOOSTUDIO EYEBROW MASCARA: Create fuller-looking eyebrow definition that lasts for days with this smudge-proof waterproof eyebrow gel. Fill in, shape, and define brows with the eyebrow spoolie brush and sculpting tip for fuller, thicker-looking brows.

DEFINE YOUR BROW: No eye look is complete without Maybelline Eyebrow Makeup--frame your eyes and fill in those brows with our precise Micro Eyebrow Pencil, with TattooStudio Waterproof Eyebrow Gel, and arch-defining Total Temptation Eyebrow Definer Pencil

MAYBELLINE IS THE EYE EXPERT: Whatever your signature eye look, whether natural or dramatic, Maybelline helps create looks that draw eyes. With a broad selection of pencil & liquid eyeliners, highly pigmented eyeshadows, iconic mascara, & eyebrow makeup.

MAYBELLINE HAS WHAT YOU NEED to create any look--foundation, bb creams, concealers & highlighters to create a perfect canvas, eyeshadows, brow pencils & eyeliners for any eye look & lip products, from showstopping matte lipstick to au natural lip balms.
REMOVE MAYBELLINE MAKEUP WITH MICELLAR WATER: Use Garnier Micellar Water as a gentle makeup remover at night, and as a facial cleanser in the morning to prep skin for Maybelline makeup.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
